diversity.midnightconfig.permission_enab: Enable this if you want to use with LuckPerms.
diversity.midnightconfig.click_through_i:
Allows right-clicking through signs and item frames (must holding item) if they are placed on chests, barrels, or shulker boxes (container blocks).
Behave exactly like normally open container.
Shift to rotate item/edit sign.
diversity.midnightconfig.copper_bulb_tic: Make copper bulb block delay 1 tick like in the snapshot.
diversity.midnightconfig.bundle_place_mo:
Switch to place mode by holding bundle and shift-leftclick to the ground.
Then you can place block that inside the bundle.
diversity.midnightconfig.bundle_enchantm: Add 2 enchantment for bundle (refill and capacity).
diversity.midnightconfig.banner_trohpy.t: Add some Ominous banner-like banners as trophy. Obtains via boss drops, etc.
diversity.midnightconfig.waxed_copper_in: Waxed copper blocks will emit particles if holding a spyglass while sneaking.
diversity.midnightconfig.rabbit_eat_carr: Rabbit can breed after eat carrot crops.
diversity.midnightconfig.mace_rotate_blo: Use mace (sneaking + right-click) to rotate directional blocks if possible.
diversity.midnightconfig.chicken_egg_des: Chicken eggs on ground will try to hatch after it despawned.
diversity.midnightconfig.check_villager_: Check villager work schedule by holding Clock in hand and right-click any type of workstation block
diversity.midnightconfig.spyglass_what_i: See additional block/entity information with a Spyglass, default radius is 5 blocks, zoom with Spyglass will extend to 32 blocks
diversity.midnightconfig.invisible_frame:
Make item frames invisible by shift + right-clicking a non-dyed glass pane into them.
They stay invisible when holding an item, otherwise, they emit particles as indicators.
diversity.midnightconfig.faster_oxidizat: Copper block and its variations oxidize faster in rain and water.
diversity.midnightconfig.softer_sweetBer:
Sneaking through sweet berry bushes.
Wearing pants protects you from sweet berry bush damage.
diversity.midnightconfig.no_level_limit_:
Removes the "Too Expensive" limitation from anvils.
In Client side will still displays the "Too expensive" label, but still functional.
diversity.midnightconfig.prevent_farmlan: Farmland is not trampled if the entity (including players) is wearing Feather Falling boots or has the Slow Falling effect.
diversity.midnightconfig.prevent_setSpaw: Sneak and right-click a bed to sleep without changing your respawn point.
diversity.midnightconfig.sleep_dont_skip:
Sleeping doesn't clear weather.
RAIN_ONLY will keep rain only.
ALL_WEATHER will keep rain and thunder (this mode will prevent you from sleeping while thundering)
diversity.midnightconfig.shulker_label.t: Shulker box will shows its custom name upon placed.
diversity.midnightconfig.usable_suspicio: You can add items (by shift right-click) into empty suspicious sand and gravel.
diversity.midnightconfig.more_enchantmen:
Add weaker versions of the four protection enchantments.
These provide extra protection with effects identical to the originals but at only 25% of their original power.
Nametag contains 'silent' or 'shutup' will make mobs silent
diversity.midnightconfig.baby_nametag.to: Nametag contains 'baby' will force baby animals never grow up
diversity.midnightconfig.brushable_parro: Brushing parrots or chickens will drop feathers.
diversity.midnightconfig.explosive_sniff:
Right-click powder (gun powder, blaze powder, sugar, redstone, glowstone dust) to Sniffer will make it sniffs and...
"To teach kids never to sniff something unknown."
- Faewulf
diversity.midnightconfig.sniffer_get_spo: Sniffer will drops Spores blossom/Small dripleaf when sniffed on moss blocks.
Foxes can bury items in sand or gravel.
diversity.midnightconfig.pet_patting.too: Interact with your pets via shift + right-click (wolf, cat, horse, parrot) to pat them.
diversity.midnightconfig.piglin_goldenTr: Piglins treat golden trimmed armor as golden armor.
diversity.midnightconfig.horse_can_seat_: Tamed animals wearing saddles won't move around.
diversity.midnightconfig.prevent_tamed_h: Horses, donkeys, and mules can fit in boats!
diversity.midnightconfig.random_size_fis: Fish and squid now come in random sizes.
diversity.midnightconfig.smaller_bee.too: Bees are now half their default size.
diversity.midnightconfig.emote.tooltip: Perform sound like meow, purr, purroew, and woof if chat or via /emote command.
diversity.midnightconfig.slime_chunk_che: Command /slimechunkcheck to check if standing chunk is slime chunk or not.
